author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Gulf Air Slashes fares on Istanbul for travelers booking flights this monthTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Gulf Air Slashes fares on Istanbul for travelers booking flights this month Published on : Tuesday, July 14, 2015
Gulf Air is slashing fares on its 04 weekly flights to and from Istanbul for travelers booking flights this month across the airline’s Middle East and Asia network for travel before end October 2015 with return Economy Class fares starting from as low as USD519 to Bombay and USD581 to Karachi.
Boasting one of the Middle East’s largest networks with double daily flights to over ten cities in the Arabian Gulf region, Gulf Air is well-positioned to connect Istanbul to several key destinations in the Middle East and Asia with excellent connectivity via its efficient Bahrain International Airport hub.
Source:- Gulf Air
